definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sow, scatter seed (NH id.; As. zirû TP:Prism vi. 15; Ar. zara9a; Aram. zra9, [[זְרַע]]; Eth. zar0: zar9 but in Sab. [[דַרא]] DHM:ZMG 1883, 15 and in n.pr., Id. in MV:10, pp. 242, 983)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[זׇרַע]] Ju Jdg 6:3; 1 S. [[וְזׇרַעְתִּ֫י]] Je 31:27; sf. [[וּזְרַעְתִּיהָ]] consec Ho 2:25; 3 pl. [[זׇֽרְעוּ]] Je 12:13; 2 mpl. [[זְרַעַתֶּם]] Hag 1:6; [[וּזְרַעְתֶּם]] consec. Ge 47:23 + 2 t.; Impf. [[יִזְרָָע]] Ec 11:4; [[וַיִּזְרַע]] Ge 26:12; sf. [[וַיִּזְרָעֶהָ]] Ju Jdg 9:45; 1 S. [[אֶזְדְעָה]] Jb Job 31:8; sf. [[וְאֶזְרָעֵם]] Zec 10:9, etc.; Imv. ms. [[זְרַע]] Ec 11:6; mpl. [[זִרְעוּ]] Ho 10:12 +2 t.; Inf. [[לִזְרׂעַ]] Is 28:24; Pt. act. [[זׁרֵעַ]] Is 55:10 + 3 t.; [[זזׁרֵעַ]] Pr 22:8, Je 50:16, etc.; Pt. pass. [[זׇרֻעַ]] Ps 97:11 (but on text v. infr.); f. [[זְרוּעָה]] Je 2:2; —
lit. sow:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. sow (seed), do one's sowing Ju Jdg 6:3, Ge 26:12 (J), Is 28:24 (after ploughing [[חרשׁ]]); [[זִרְעוּ וקחרו ונטעו]] [[כרמים]] Is 37:30 = 2Ki 19:29; ‖[[קחר]] also Mic 6:15, Le 25:11 (H), Ec 11:4; ‖[[אסף]] Le 25:20 (H); opp. [[אכל]] Job 31:8; [[זׁרְעֵי על־כל־מים]] Is 32:20 (on cstr. cf. Ges:§ 130, 1); c. [[את־השּׁנה הַשׁמינִת]] Le 25:22; sq. [[הַרְבֵּה]] Hag 1:6 (opp. [[הָבֵא מְעָָט]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: sq. 2 acc. [[לאׁ תזרע כַּרְמְךָ כִּלְאַָיִם]] De 22:9; cf. [[שָׂדְךָ לאׁ תִזְרַע כִּלְאַיִם]] Le 19:19 (H); [[זַרְעֲךָ אשׁר־תזדע את־האדמה]] Is 30:23; also of destroyed city [[וַיִּזְרָעֶהָ מֶָלַח]] Ju Jdg 9:45.
of shrub and tree producing, yielding seed, c. acc. cogn. Ge 1:29, Ge 1:29 (P), cf.

definitions.title: Hiph. 3.
definitions.body: fig.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of Yahweh's sowing (planting) Isr. in the land [[וזרעתיה לי]] [[בָארץ]] Ho 2:25 (We [[וזרעתיהו]], obj. being Jezreel); on the other hand [[וְאֶזְרָעֵם בָּעַמִּים]] Zec 10:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. 2 acc., of Yahweh's fructifying Isr. and Judah [[יהודה זֶרַע אדם וזרע]] ´[[וזרעתי את־בית ישׂראל ואת־ב]] [[בהמה]] Je 31:27.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of moral action, [[זִרְעוּ לָכֶם]] [[לִחְדָקָה]] Ho 10:12 (‖[[קחר]]); [[חדקה]]´[[ז]] Pr 11:18; [[אַל־תִּזְרְעוּ]] [[אֶל־קׂחִים]] Je 4:3 sow not in among thorns (said of a few righteous deeds amid much wickedness); esp. of evil-doing [[רוּחַ יזרעו וְסוּפָתָה יִקְחָׂרוּ]] Ho 8:7; [[זׁרְעֵי עָמָל]] Job 4:8 (‖[[קחר]]); [[זוֹרֵעַ עַוְלָה יקחור־אָוֶן]] Pr 22:8.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of Israel's practising idolatry [[זְמׂרַת]] [[זׇר תִּזְרָעֶָנּוּ]] Is 17:10 (2 acc.)

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[הזרעים בדמעה בְּרִנׇּה]] [[יִקְחָׂרוּ]] Ps 126:5 metaph. of distress followed by joy.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[אוֹר זׇרֻעַ לַצַּדִּיק]] Ps 97:11 rd. prob. [[זׇרַח]], Vrss Ol Hu Bae Che al.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be sown, fructified, Pf. 3 fs. [[וְנִזְרְעָה]] consec. Nu 5:28; 2 mpl. [[וְנִזְרַעְתֶּם]] consec. Ez Eze 36:9; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִזׇּרַע]] Na 1:14; [[יִזׇּרֵָעַ]] De 21:4, Le 11:37; 3 fs. [[תִּזׇּרַע]] De 29:22; —
be sown:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: subj. [[אֶרֶץ]], [[ולא תַּחְמִחַ]] ´[[לאׁ תִזּ]] De 29:22, cf. (of [[נַחַכ אֵיתָן]]) [[לא יֵעָבֵּד]] ´[[בּוֹ ולא יִזּ]] De 21:4; in address to [[הָרֵי ישׂראל]], [[וְנֶעֱבַּדְתֶּם וְנִזְרַעְתֶּם]] Ez Eze 36:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: subj. [[זֶרַע]], [[זֶרַע זֵרוּעַ]] [[אשׁר יִזׇּרֵעַ]] Le 11:37 (P); fig. [[מִשִּׁמְךָ עוֹד]] ´[[לאׁ יִזּ]] Na 1:14 no more of thy name be sown, in judgment against Nineveh.
be fructified, made pregnant [[וְנִזְרְעָה זׇרַָע]] Nu 5:28 (P; of woman).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[זׁרָָעוּ]] Is 40:24 of princes and judges under fig. of trees (‖[[נִטָָּעוּ]], [[שׁׂרֵשׁ בָּאָרֶץ גִּזְעָם]]).
produce seed, of herb, c. acc. cogn. Ge 1:11, Ge 1:12; appar. denom. fr. [[זֶרַע]]; cf.

definitions.title: Qal 2. 2.
definitions.body: of a woman, = bear a child [[תַּזְרִיעַ וְיׇלְֽדָה זׇכָר]] Le 12:2.
